name: Defuser
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:

Find all 8 bombs! They're scattered around the island. Headphones are suggested because you can hear them ticking and it will help you locate all of them before they explode!

WASD - Movement
SPACE - Jump
ENTER - Reset Game
L - Explode all the bombs! (So that you don't have to wait 10 mins to see what happens if you lose.)
